content.detailedDescription: At approx. 7:30 p.M. this evening, as i and a friend sat on our back deck in conversation , i looked up and saw this contrail in the slightly north and west sky above my home. i rudely interrupted our conversation and asked her to look at it too, which she did , as i explained what i saw and why it was important. i have read , watched videos and television shows, and it was...Donuts on a rope . period - there is no other way to describe it . whatever caused it was unheard and unseen, we had typical high winds today , 25-30 miles an hour, with gusts to 35 mph , but this was at an altitude that, while clearly visible and fairly low, was not quite as subject to these wind speeds . we watched and the winds diminished / dissipated it over 10-15 minutes, but it was the largest , fattest and most unusual contrail i 've ever seen, and i watch ( and listen to )  planes many nights ( and days ) as i grew up in the flight path of the airport and live just a very few miles south and east of boeing wichita. we get all kinds of planes all the time, and we get nice straight thin jet contrails - this was noticably very different . with the winds, we heard no sound at ground level, this is all i can report . i would just like this noted. thank you - kim . vornauf
content.summary: Contrail - donuts on a rope - indisputable

content.detailedDescription:
While driving to west lafayette from the northwest -state hwy 52. i slowed down to flash my brights on a truckdriver that was slowed to the side of the shoulder. i happened to glance up to the sky to see a series of three lights, in a horizantal pattern. fade to black, one after another, from left to right.Extending my arm and flashing a peace sign, mid way between the horizon and straight up, will aproxamate the distance all the lights were spread out. at the next traffic signal, in west lafayette. i happened to have driven in front of, and passed the truck driver. i got out of my vehicle  and asked him if he saw something unusual in the night sky. he replied that he had. i asked him if he would mind turning into the menards parking lot and telling me about what he saw. he said not at all. he went on to  further state that it might have been in the aprox. area of grissom air base. near peru, indiana. he saw 3 or 4 yellow lights one to the left middle and right.  in a straight horizantal line. when they went out, he said they appeared to  fade out, one by one.
the truck driver and i both confirmed to one another we had not seen anything like this before.
the weather was clear, stars were clearly visable.
content.summary: Unusual sequence of lights in the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were at polihale state park located on the north-west side of
kauai.  we viewed the sunset and were talking while observing the night
sky.  the quarter moon and venus, over the ocean was to my back, and a dipper star constellation was over my left shoulder, as i stood facing inland.
at approximately 1930 hrs., while looking above the mountain range at the
night sky i noticed what i thought to be a star at first, growing in size and light intensity.  it expanded while keeping a perfectly circular shape, and
it brightened in proportion to it's growing size. i'd estimate that at it's largest, it was just larger than a dime held at arms length.  there seemed to be a smaller grey-ish circle at it's center.  it remained enlarged for 5 seconds or so, and then began to decrease in size.  startled, i tried to help my wife off the tailgate of the truck so she could see it.  in doing so i looked away for a moment, and when i looked again, it now looked like just
another star in the sky.  it remained stationary for 5 seconds or so, then began to move in a south-easterly direction.  i have observed satellites tracking through the evening sky, and it look like this except it moved abit faster than i've seen satellites travel.  it tracked steady and straight till  
i could no longer see it.
the only other experience of the evening, which i thought strange, was how disoriented i felt driving home, which is roughly a 20 minute drive, and for about an hour or so after returning.  
after some time to think about what we saw, i could only relate this to possibly being a stationary satellite that performed a 'burn' to be relocated 
although from my view and angle, the light never resembled that of what i would think a burning rocket motor to look like.  
furthermore, after sharing this with a friend today, she went online and showed me a satellite/iss tracking page that shows what, if any, was visible at my location and time.  nothing was overhead within 2 hours before, or after.
content.summary: Star-like light in night sky grew in size and intensity, decreased in size and moved

content.detailedDescription: Was outside in back yard last night. looking at the stars. the night was very clear and the moon and the large planet that is near it were very visible. i noticed a star like object with the same white color and size of a small to medium star moving across the atmosphere. very high up in the sky. it moved west to east across the sky in a straight line. very near the speed of a commercial jetliner. i found out from afriend that you cannot see a sattelite without a telescope. is this true? could have been of human origins. (experimental or something already in service.)ther were no blinking lights, just white and steady. if they were e.T.S they were just cruising along. a person would really have to be concentrating on the sky to have seen this. i have seen ufo's in the past similar to this. if they are real i hope they will help us with our problems.
content.summary: Star like object  (small to medium size)

content.detailedDescription: I was heading next door to my friend's house when i looked up toward the west and saw two identical lights floating in mid air. they flckered like fire and made a very faint rumbling noise. i stood there for about three minutes, then i hurried and ran to my friend's house i told him to hurry and come out side we ran out on to his drive way, i then pointed at the pair of lights. we stood there for one minute untill the lights moved as one straight down then hovered toward the south and and light speed darted toward kingsley feild air base the vanished in thin air!!! ive never seen anything like it before in my life
content.summary: 2 lights right to left, moved as if it was one

content.detailedDescription:
My cousin, desi, was driving and his wife, rita, was in the back seat. we were on the i-80 eastbound in indiana about 10:15 pm heading back to new york for xmas. they were arguing about a light in the distance, off to our left. desi said it was the top of a tower; rita said it was moving. after a few minutes watching the light, you had to admit that it was moving. sometimes it would move very quickly forward, then stay in one spot for a while, then move slowly backwards, then stay in one spot for a while again, then move forwards quickly again. occasionally, a light would flicker rapidly, maybe a blue or green light, not like an airplane light that goes on and off. it seemed incandescent. after about 10 minutes of watching this light, desi pulled into a gas station to fill-up. we weren't even talking about this light.

when we got back on the road, rita was driving and desi sat in the back. rita spotted it again, and this time it was closer because it was brighter. then, suddenly, it zipped across the i-80 and stayed in one spot. when we approached it, i rolled the window down, so that there would be no reflection. desi and i stuck our heads out the window. it was about 30 yards off the highway, about the height of a water tower. it was saucer-shaped with windows around it, and what appeared to be lights on top, although they were not lit. after we passed it, desi and i were about to start looking through the rear window when it took off in a flash. with no sound, and extremely fast, it was gone. 

we were all amazed that we had actually seen a flying saucer. it sure didn't seem like anything our government was building and operating. we weren't scared or anything. it was more a feeling of awe.
content.summary: We had a very close-up look at a flying saucer in indiana in the winter of 1975.

content.detailedDescription:
Dear mufon investigator,

i hesitate to bring this to your attention, as i am one who often prefers to look for a rational explanation for many of these so-called "phenomena", however i could find no such reasoning for what had befallen me on this night, nearly a month ago now.

i was sitting on my back porch, listening to neil diamond and billy idol, while sipping on my champagne and rocking in my rocking chair. it was a relatively quiet night, with only a few kookaburras in the background, and the faint cry of a dingo.

my wife, by this time, had since retired to bed, and i was not yet heading that way myself, as i still had much to complete from my days work. i was alerted by my dearest pet cat to a strange goings on in the night sky, and to my bemusement and wonder i happened to notice an unidentified flying object, known as a ufo.

it was in the shape of a triangle, or so i assumed, as all i could see of it were a red, yellow and white flashing lights at each 'corner'. it was travelling at a steady pace across the night sky, in a westerly direction. i estimated that it was approximately 1400 metres in the air (this is merely an estimation, as i had no real point of reference at the time) and was decending at a uniform pace.

it is my guess that about 10 kilometres down the road in the direction it was travelling, the craft would have collided with the earth, however i was unable to see this as it dissappeared behind the treeline. the whole incident lasted less than 5 minutes, and it left me confused and scared.

however, i have not reported this to anyone as it was not reported in the news, and no mention was made of it by my friends. unfortunately, i had not the presence of mind to take a photo or recording of the object.
i hope this was helpful,

hermon sniggerfield.
content.summary: Tri-coloured flashing lights moved across the sky in a direction of east to west.

content.detailedDescription:
Dearest mufon members

i present to you a tale of mystery, of suspense of biblical proportion. i was sitting out the back in the rockn' chair listening to the serenity and smelling the quaint scent of 2 stroke in the air. the ever present cackling of the kookaburras. suddenly all was quiet. in the bush things do change quite sharply but not to this magnitude. i was observing a light traveling across the sky before the silence and started to notice that it was not the airplane which i first took it to be. the "craft" as i call it was traveling towards me at an incredible rate, much faster than a conventional jet airplane���s it entered a range of about 200-300 meters i began to panic, i ran inside and grabbed my rifle and fired three shots at the approaching item. two rounds hit the craft the last seemed to stop short of the object by about 10 meters and fall to the ground. the crafts speed had reached a climax speed of about 600 km per hour and was closing in being 100 meters away at the last shot fired. then at about 20 meters away (just after i accepted my own death) it stopped hovered for about 10 minutes and intimidating me and flew away at the same rate at which it came.

always faithful member
chris jeisman
content.summary: Dropped a pod.

content.detailedDescription:
The friday after september 11, i was visiting my in-laws in franklin, wv. i noticed what appeared to be a military jet flying over the house above the trees. i climbed a hill behind the house and noticed two helicopters in the distance (<1 mile) flying in the vacinity of this red, stationary dot in the sky. i also noticed that two jets were making very wide circles around that same area.

i ran down the hill to get my binoculars and when i returned, i could see, through the binoculars, a red orb (sphere) pulsating in the sky (i guess about 1/2 mile above the tree line). for the most part it remained stationary. once in awhile it would slowly move horizontally, but not a great distance (maybe 20 yards). the two helicopters monitored the orb from a distance. the two jets appeared to make wide, circular paths around the orb (i can't give you a distance, but the one jet would pass over the house about every 5 minutes).

i watched the orb for 25 minutes but it didn't really change location. i ran down the hill to tell the family,, but they did not believe me. i did not return to see the craft again so i don't know how long it was there.

there is a naval communications base in sugar grove, wv, not far from franklin. my father-in-law had seen a red orb one night when he was out plowing snow in pendelton county. he couyld not give me a year (1980s?). i could not tell what type of helicopters or airplanes that were in the sky. from my interest in jets and from seeing them in virginia beach, va, they at least sounded like military jets (a fighter type). since that sighting in 2001, i did see, a couple of years ago, a military type helicopter with no markings fly over franklin.
content.summary: Red, pulsating sphere (orb) in air (stationary) monitored by two helicopters and a jet

content.detailedDescription: At 2:30pm, my brother and i were in our back yard when we saw the ufos. he stopped and i asked why, he said "look! a ufo!" i looked over the mountain line where he was pointing, and saw a black, egg-shaped figure.  it was round on the bottom.  it was like a side-ways oval. the figure was moving slowly, moving south-west to north east.  it picked up speed as it went until it dissapeared.  then i saw a inverted pie plate traveling east, slowly.  it then disapeared behind a tree where i couldn't see it.
content.summary: 2 ufos, 1 moving slow, the other fast. moving back and forth.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving in our car to go and have dinner. as we were driving i noticed what i thought to be an airplane flying straight down at an alarming speed, so i pointed it out to my wife.  as we watched, it came down faster and faster.We were sure we were witnessing a plane crash. my wife started to worry because it no longer looked like an airplane...Bigger, and had something coming from the back of it. it was glowing brightly. we were going to call the authorities, but before we could, it immediatly stopped. it kind of changed shape, from oval, to slightly disk shaped, and had a very bright glow. it just hovered, for maybe 2 minutes, and then bolted straight forward, so fast, that it was out of sight in just a couple of seconds.
my wife and i just looked at each other, not sure what to do.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It first looked like a crashing plane, then stopped changed shape, and bolted away

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving up to my parent���s house in north ga from atlanta, having left at 11:50pm friday night. i was nearing my destination after 90 minutes of driving, having long exited the highway (hwy 515).

driving on aska road about one mile before reaching newport road, i saw two cars parked on the opposite shoulder with their lights on and their drivers standing a few yards from them on the edge of a dirt lot. aska is a long, winding road in a very remote part of ga and it is unusual to see any traffic after 10pm. i thought one of the drivers may have been having car trouble, or collided with the other driver.

i slowed to take a closer look at the scene and saw both drivers staring to the sky above a hilltop that was about half a mile away. above the hill, maybe 300 ft. in the air were a string of 12 or so bright amber lights arranged into a crescent with a very shallow curve. i first thought them to be airplanes flying in formation. i did not see the lights moving, however, and i also stopped my car and rolled down my window to get a clear view of the lights.

i did not see stars behind the general patch of sky occupied by the lights and realized i was staring at a single solid object with lights spaced along its leading edge.

i exited my car and joined the other drivers on the dirt lot and asked them what it was. neither knew, but the first driver to arrive said he had been looking at it for 5 minutes already before i arrived. the three of us traded theories about what we were looking at, finally deciding that it was most likely some kind of blimp. we all agreed it was strange that it wasn't moving at all.

15 minutes after first noticing the object, it began descending straight down and quickly disappeared behind the hilltop. it covered this distance in no more than 3 seconds. the other two drivers were surprised by this but did not seem concerned or frightened. i felt quite afraid at that point and immediately returned to my car and sped the rest of the way to my parents home. i looked for mention of the object in the local newspaper for the next two weeks and found nothing.
content.summary: Wide, shallow crescent approx. 50ft across with 12 or so bright amber lights on its leading edge.

content.detailedDescription:
After noting the object travel ne in direction and out of our view into a cloud . we then noted a track in the night sky traveling in the same direction.  after it was past we heard a big boom.

the track was like one sees when the hot exhaust of a plane hits cold upper air....Unlike skywriting which is broad, this was a narrow track.  having lived two blocks from northrup aviation in hawthorne ca in my teens, the boom was not unlike what we'd hear when planes would break the sound barrier.......And at chicago's air & water show in the summer.

we were out in the yard looking up and admiring the proximity of venus to the crescent moon........And then wham.  my son was quite excited at seeing "we don't know what".......He estimated it's speed as contrasted by the usual planes traveling overhead.  he noted that the fiery ball cut a hole in one of the clouds.......I asked him where the nearest military installation was...Because of the jet following the object.  he said rantoul .  rantoul is south of us.....I'd have to lookat a map to see if its sw.

i
content.summary: Standing in yard noted fiery red circular object traveling ne at speedy clip

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in a park with a friend...First saw 3 or 4 very dim almost translucent grey type lights (like a small spot light on the clouds but was a clear night out) going ne to n direction. i saw them but friend didnt... 30 seconds later another set whent by with no sound traveling across the horizon in about 4 seconds. we eventually over about 20 min saw roughly 10-12 sets of these lights including one set that had about 10 lights in a v duck looking formation that change shape. there was also a set of 3 or 4 that went about 2 times faster then all the other ones..That was very scary then they stoped for about 40 min then as we walked home we saw them 2 more times heading over the east end of the city of london ont. my friend called her mom who lives about a 4 min drive away in the direction these lights were going...She said she saw them but with a few seconds delay. these were not airplane or star looking lights..They where like dim-shadowy sillouets coming from nowhere. this is no joke...It rattled me and her and we are 100% confident it was nothing man made. it looked nothing like a plane, weather thingy,satelite or anything like that..This is scary cause they all went north from all diferent directions and they sometimes changed formation or crossed over eachother and or converged togtether...One i noticed was oscilating almost (shaking).
content.summary: Dim spooky lights (about 40) flying over city

content.detailedDescription: Starting on sunday may 13th, 2007, when i was lying in bed at 10:00pm (cst), i noticed a light in the north-east sky which would move quickly in small circles, fading and returning, and sometimes darting a short distance away and returning.  i saw this nightly, once until 2:00am. it seemed slightly oval, even though it was small - yet larger than any surrounding star.  last night i watched it again even though it was cloudy. i have been puzzled by it's movement and that it returns, so decided to report and inquire about it.
content.summary: Star-like object moving quickly in small circles, fades and returns, also darts.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking out the trash with a client at my place of work. i work in a facility with juveniles who are in incarceration & treatment. the sun had just gone down when we noticed an object in the sky about 40 degrees up from the horizon by the star that was the planet. the object was on the north side of the planet/star and was large enough to be some type of object like a plane or helicopter. as the client and i looked at the object we noticed that it was not moving. the object was however unjulating and changing its shape. we thought it was a flock of birds however it was very high up in the air and it never moved, just kept changing its shape like a blob. the object was also totally black, no light however it had this edge like it was composed of something liquid. being in the western sky after sunset with the sky still bright, there should have been some type of light reflected off it however it was like the pure absense of any light. planes landing at the slc airport were coming in just under where we witnessed the object. it was about the same size as the planes coming in however it appeared to be far higher than the planes. we could not figure out what this object was. i also attempted to take a picture of this with my phone, the planet/star would show on the display of the phone however the object would not. this was weird since the object was large enough to show.
the client and i watched the object for a few minutes stay in the same place. the object then traveled to the other side of the planet/star and took another stationary place. the time that it took to move was about 2 minutes. i took the client inside our facility. i then went back outside and continued to watch the object. it started to get smaller however it stayed in the exact same place. i watched it for about 15 minutes total. it basically just shrunk out of sight while the sky started to get darker. the entire time that i watched the object, there was nothing in the sky except the plant/star and the occasional plane coming into land at the airport. the sky was cloud free and clear.
when the client and i first went back in the building we ran into one of my coworkers taking out trash too. we told him that there was something in the sky and he asked what we were smoking outside. i saw him come back in from taking out his trash and he stated that he witnessed the object too. when i went outside i grabbed two other coworkers and told them to come look at this. they came outside with me and noticed it too as it was going out of sight.
content.summary: A solid black object that kept changing shape then moved and slowly shrunk in a stationary place.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on bristol st. in elkhart, in.  i looked up in the clear sky and i noticed a tear drop shaped object.  it seemed to be heading towards the ground, but it was up really high and seemed to be falling away from me towards the western sky.  it did not have a long tail, more of a stubby one... which made it look more like a tear drop to me.  it was going for about 5 mins. in a downward angle, then it seemed to start heading straight out that lasted for another 13 mins or so.  ..It was heading more of a western direction instead of a downward angle at this point.  it was going pretty fast because i noticed the how the size was getting smaller.  it continued on it's path.  as i decided to turn away and start heading home, i noticed a streak in the sky... like a jet trail of another object, heading in the direction of the object i first saw.  i tried watching it more, but traffice behind me started getting impatient.  i lost the object through the tree line that was about 30 yards away from me. 

the object i saw had a surface like a jet streak.  it looked like a cloud, in a tear drop shape & was obviously moving.  i thought i was falling, but its velocity seemed to be carrying it towards the western sky, at a faster rate that gravity was pulling it.   in the end, it no longer seemed to falling, but flying away... fast.

i felt curious to see what it was.  it was a clear day, so i knew others could see as well.  which is why i am reporting it.  i wanted to know if there was an official explanation.
content.summary: I saw a shape that looked like a comet coming down in the distant sky.  i found it odd beause it was still day time and it didn't have long tail

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting out of the hot tub right at 8:30pm. this bright light caught my eye. at first thinking it was very large plane at first. but it was way to big an bright to be that far away. so ofcourse i kept whatching it. then it dawn on me oh my god could it be? what was it? i ran in the house to get my binocular and get a better look!! but the binocular didn't help it was jumping around to much to have a clear view. i didn't, couldn't, understand why i was still couldn't see it better! then i said shit get the camera ran in an got back out as fast as i could!! now ya ready for this, the pictures show something totally differnt.  my camera is a nikon d-70 with the af on it couldn't focus it was going in & out. to much time was being wasted. so being very pump i started snaping!! now here it goes the pictures of this ufo are as weird as it comes to me, i mean what i saw with my naked eyes was a very large bright ball are star like. through the binocular the same kind of but it seem farther? the pictures well it s like this what every frame your looking at it something differnt from a metal looking cloud, a small bright upside down u, then a large or long y, with the tips of it pruple&green, then all most the same but longer, to allmost can't see it sphere light green, to a very bright in your face jagged line wide. i've look at them 3 times now while i'm tpying you an that the best i can do.  oh yes  and poof it they were gone!!!! 

 and no i'm not going to down load these pictures. i will have someone do it for me tommorow. computers downloading pictures an stuff. i'm not very good at it , i know what i've got, no matter what anybody else says. i know what i saw. and what i saw was not from here. you've got my number call me around 10:30am. i'll most likely have them in every freaking size you can get!!!!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Large bright object very unsteady with spark  or something falling from the bottom with a small ufo to its bottom left

content.detailedDescription: June the fifth,my brothers were due from there last day at school.My mother and i were gardening.All animals and bugs became quite.We looked around and saw a cloud on a cloudless day rainning on our barn. when it left off the barn it bounced as a ballon. standing dumbfounded it managed to rain on us before we ran into the house. my mother made me lock all doors and windows then take a bath. me and my brothers could not go out the rest of the day. that was friday. the next day at breakfest my brothers rediculed me and even my mother.I headed to the backdoor when i saw a lizard in what was later told me was a greek toga the material was earadesant but white, sandals and a large electric brouch. as i looked in to this brouch thing i was hipnotyzed the lizard spoke as my mother speaks calling me little man come with me. i broke the concentration. with my right arm waved to my sibblings to come to the door. when i turned to look at my brothers the lizard was gone. i refused to go out with out my family.Then the next day sunday i sat on the front pourch all day something came onto the pourch quitely pushed our swing aside walked past me stoped as if looking for something then stepped into the grass i could see the grass part. then i said i see u then jumped up ran in side. told my mother. that monday i was dropped of at the baby sitters when my mom picked me up she was excited that she had taken several photos. tuesday we went to retrive them the man who ran a jewelery/photo store on trade st. also served in the military with my uncle. came out of the store. stopped my mother said he had messed up.Mother said were the photos bad, he replyed no that he called the f.B.I. in greensboro that they had treatened him and then his family. he pointed we saw a goverment license plate on a dodge, then two men came to our home and threatened us. that they would make us look like fools and liers. note at the same time in this area the local news reported on what was called the viennia monster which ate any and everything, i belive the lizard was sent to capture this monster who was an alien also.Theres an uclamed photo that i reckinized the craft and tree line. one photo did not get destroyed
content.summary: It was so hot that a cloud covered it

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog east. our street is dark. saw this object moving slowly north. it looked like it got brighter then dimmer. when i saw this thing take a right angle turn is when i freaked out. did i just really see that? when i got home i let my other dogs out. i was still in shock that i saw something like that happen. so i went out side again to see if i could somehow see this thing again and get lucky.  after a min later another lite came into focus. moving from south to north it got brighter, stopped then just took off.  i had a strange feeling it knew i was watching it!  i know, sounds crazy.

thanks

-dale
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light took right angle turn

content.detailedDescription: Pointed the vidocam to the air. found this scene as i was scanning the video later.
content.summary: Ufo flying through clouds

content.detailedDescription: Pointed the vidocam to the air. found this scene as i was scanning the video later.
content.summary: Ufo flying through clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was filming the sky (as john bro did)to capture ufos in my video cam. after filming, i scanned the scenes frame by frame, and spotted many interesting and unusal lights and shapes. attached is one of those events filmed. 

i converted mpeg file into gif to show slow motions of the object. the length of this video clip is about 1/3 of a second.
content.summary: Ufo in transformation in the air

content.detailedDescription:
In 1965 i was living in the city of kearny, nj, at 499 belgrove drive to be exact. the address was that of the now defunct new jersey boystown. i had almost a 2 year stay there from 1965 to 1967. 
we usually ate dinner at 5pm everyday, and as usual we had to line up outside, then walk down to the mess hall. as i waited in line i was gazing at the skyline before me (the back of boystown faces the passiac river and newark) the area is much a higher elevation than newark, so the view was great. as i looked up i saw a full moon to my upper left and settled my gaze on that for a moment. the sky was clear for a december evening...No haze or clouds.
 
i saw a "dot" fly from the left side of the moon and that caught my attention! the "dot" got bigger and bigger by the second and it was clear to me and everyone else that this "dot" was a fireball! 
within less than a minute it was flying in to my left and was as big as a house and flying an altitude of what a jet looks like when approaching to land. it vered a little and seemed to find a "path" to fly the rest of it's flight. 

my thought at the time was "this can't be a meteor because it's flying horizontally" i always thought meteors came in on a diagonal and smashed into the earth. this fireball was flying at an amazingly slow speed and i thought "how is that thing staying in the air"? 
as the event ended there was a lot of talking in line by the guys waiting to go to dinner, and we were told to settle down. needless to say it was the talk of the night and the next day. 
the next day the radio said it was a meteor, and also joked that they received calls that people called it a ufo and even said they saw windows in it. that was 1965, here it is 2007 and i still remember it like it was yesterday. i hope one day the truth of my experience will come to light. 
johnny
content.summary: Photo addendum to prior report of fireball

content.detailedDescription:
Http://www.Atmoreadvance.Com/articles/1999/12/29/export278.Txt
first, it would be expected by human logic for you to call me and say:

"hello, yes, we have already investigated this event. i'm pleased to inform you what went over your area was indeed a meteor which is scientifically documented and proven 100%"
"yes, we have it on record."

then there would be no need for me to put myself in line for ridicule, harrassment, public humiliation, or possibly even physical danger by reporting some of this story.

so i'll share this much with you. the link to the news article does not contain any testimony from me or my family. we have never told a living soul outside our immediate family of anything transpiring that night. or of past events & experiences that are beginning to take shape and form pieces of a larger puzzle. 

late april 2007:
"oh my god!..Moma?..Moma look! it's like what happened here! moma? moma?" 
   eyes glued to the youtube video in front of me i barely registered the rising panic in my son's voice. i sat transfixed as i watched an almost identical recreation of some actual events we experienced years ago. (an experience we'll never forget, and unexplainably remembered as only about 3 years ago.) although there were slight differences in this report, the main framework remained the same and consistent. even though the youtube video broadcast supposedly took place in a different geographical location(maybe phoenix or arizona)..The resulting phenomena were too similiar to ignore.
   finally, we were finding similarities & connections to an event that sent chills down my spine & caused my hair to stand on end. although i felt profound relief and not fear. it's as if a light came on...Click!
   never one to leave well enough alone, or give up..I was determined to go back to that late night several years ago to see if i could once and for all settle the disturbing thoughts running rampant in my mind. i figured i had one of 2 choices:
1)plan a: research all scientific data and prove to myself it was most possibly & logically a "meteor" as suggested by some eye witnesses & authorities. (to my knowledge never proven & put under the rug)
2)plan b: if plan a failed admit we were not alone in this universe...

plan a failed
content.summary: Fireball in sky baffles authorities over atmore alabama

content.detailedDescription:
Vactioning with my family on the riviera maya in mexico last year when we explored the ruins of tulum.  this was on a sunday morning where the ruins are not overrun by too many tourists.  most visitors were locals enjoying the free entrance, sights and beautiful beach.  my oldest child and i took pictures of the ruins up and down.  we ended in the afternoon swimming at the beach and otherwise enjoyed an interesting day.  next day at the hotel i overheard several of the local workers talk about sightings of ufo's up / down the coast line near tulum but never gave it a second thought.  upon returning to the states i uploaded the pictures from the digital camera to our pc.  started looking at the photos when i noticed a speck in the corner of one shot.  upon maximizing it i first thought it resembled  a helicopter but we all remembered how quiet and peaceful the days was and did not hear any aircraft.  upon further review the bottom of the craft seems to have some sort of glow and seems to be almost oscillating.   my oldest has been bugging me ever since to either submit this picture to a ufo site or have a professional photograhper look into it.

i'm a bit of a skeptic but i cannot seem to explain that object or the coincendence that people saw ufo's the same day the shot was taken.
content.summary: Caught ufo on shot of mayan ruins @ tulum

content.detailedDescription: I was with my ex- wife louise , my nephew brian and his friend sandra . we had taken a small interest in stargazing and behind the metro zoo was quite a good location for it was quite removed from the city light glare . we had left the car and started to walk toward a small bridge that crossed a rather deep ravine when i noticed a pinpoint of light quite close to the wooden structure . all four of us left the trail and turned to our right up a slope that eventually overlooked this ravine . just about to the crest brian and sandra stopped and did not continue any farther , but my wife and i continued on. we had the habit of holding hands while out walking and this time was no different . when we reached the crest we were both saw the object at the same time . it looked like a disk edge on . directly in the middle was a rather large window with a being visible from the waist up . this man like creature was darkish brown , no visible hair , large eyes , no nose , and a small mouth. at this point in time i have to state i am colour blind in some shades but i am sure this was the colour of the creature . he or it was very busy working below the window edge with something or other while looking to our right , not at us . this is were this report gets all together strange and this is why i have not told anyone except my curent girlfriend. at some point in time while louise and i were gazing at this structure , maybe two or three minutes, i got a very , very strong feeling to pull my wife back from the crest but she seemed to refuse . i started to shout at her and warn her that the thing was going to explode , where i got this from i dont know. i finaly strugled her back from the crest and while heading toward my nephew and sandra we heard a rather loud but muffled bang . we were now stading beside the trail looking at each other and trying to tell what we had seen when a car drove slowly past us with two people inside . if you want more information on this report please feel free to call . i will gladley fax drawings and exact location .
content.summary: Craft was nestled in a small ravine  that i was familiar with.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on highway 99 near rogue river and all of a sudden, green flashes hit in front of my car as if they were shooting at me. there were three of them flying in a wege formation like the military, but i turned on my military scanner and picked up nothing. i was listining to a news show on my radio, but during the event, i herd communication over the radio. there were four voices on it. what was strange was they used call signs and they spoke perfect english. the call signs they used was alpha 1-1, 1-2, 1-3 and command? so i followed for one hour till they shot strait up. they looked like a h if you looked at he front. ecause it from the sides, the wings were shaped like a hexagon. on the back were two red lights. there was a sphere in the center with a window in the front. i couldnt see in there it was dark. but it was obious that it was an one person craft. it was about ten meters wide and black and blew colors except the lead ship that had a mustard yellow color on the front half of the "wings". after the incident, i couldnt sleep. this morning, i heard military craft flying overhead at high speed. so i called a friend at kinglesy afb. he said that they were doing drills.
content.summary: 3 of them. flew close to ground like a plane. strange radio communication over my car radio. loud screech from object

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting outside in the backyard on the eveneing of may 9th wed, at aprox 10:12 pm , a friend and i spotted fast moving lights in the sky .My buddy yul first noticed the light as they travelled very quickly across the sky. i did not have my glasses on and could not find the objects he was referring to. i quickly grabbed my 20 x 70 binoculars which were near by and was able to clearly see a very very bright object, brighter than any of the surrounding stars, moving very rapidly across the sky. my friend yul advised me that three had gone by prior to my viewing the fourth. 

the crafts seemed to be fleeing. as they were moving so fast. we could not tell if they were within our atmosphere or in space. the nearest reference point was a nearby star which the moving light passed by.

i did not think these were airplanes as i have watched many airplanes fly by and none with this type of speed. the lights each seemed to dissappear shortly after passing overhead. 

i was very surprised to see multiple lights moving at such a high rate of speed.My friend yul was ecstatic as this was his first sighting and my second. the strange thing is that i have witnesses two sightings basically in the same region of sky. i am beginning to wonder what is it about this area of the sky / heavens .
content.summary: While outside on the evening of monday may 9th my friend yul noticed three objects fly by heading in the same direction- i did not see the first three. i grabbed my 20x 70 binoculars and was able to see craft # 4 as it sped in the same direction

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern:
         i was a witness to an extraordinary event that may have involved hundreds of people in fort stockton, texas, in the year 1972.  i am looking for anyone who may remember any thing out of the ordinary during that year, the year before or the year after. what you are about to read is truly extraordinary and unbelievable.  but it really happened exactly as you are about to read it and as i am going to write it.   there may even be numerous witnesses alive today that can validate what you are about to read.          
        during the late sixties and seventies, my dad delivered sodas for a dr. pepper company out of pecos.  for those of you that remember, my dad���s name was gerald d wilson.  mr. wilson ran a gas station for 2 years near the sands motel off 285 and i10.  then he worked for coors for the rest of his life. my name is carl wilson.  i will keep my brothers name out of this to protect their reputations.  i was a junior or a senior at that time, but i can���t recall the exact date. i do remember that it this extraordinary sighting occurred just before graduation.  this is what occurred.
        as i mentioned before, while i was in high school, my dad worked for a dr. pepper company out of pecos texas.  some days he would have too much work to do by himself, so made my older brothers and i skip school to help him out.
        one day my dad was making a delivery to a convenience store on the corner of n rio st. and the main drag.  the convenience store is still there today.  it faces 285 and i10.  
        that day, my dad parked his delivery truck in front of the store at an angle facing rio st. so that it would be easier for him to leave after he made his deliveries.  after he parked his truck, he reached across my brother and popped me in the chest with the back of his hand.  then he said, ���you boys ever see a ufo?���  my brother and i replied in unison, ���no sir.���  then he said, ���there���s ya one sitten over there,��� as he pointed out his driver-side window.
        when i looked out of the window, i saw a giant silver object hovering over the elementary school across the street.  this object was in the shape of a boomerang and it was so big that it covered the entire school.  from my angle it appeared to hover no more than 30 feet above the school.  it looked like it was so close to the roof that someone could reach up and touch it.  
       it was thick near the front and it tapered near the back like a wing on and airplane.  i noticed that it was thicker than the height of the building so it had to be at least 15 to 30 feet thick in the front.  it was solid silver like shiny mylar or foil but i don���t recall seeing any windows on it. i did notice that it had ridges on it that were spaced about 10 feet apart that went from front to back.  the bottom was not flat, it curved like a wing.
       now here is the weird part about the whole sighting.  as my dad was getting out of the truck, he said, ���now i don���t want you boys standing around watching that ufo.  we���ve got work to do.���  then he just stepped out of the truck and went into the store to find out what they needed.  while he was gone my brother and i waited for him to come back and give us the list of things that we needed unloaded.  so, i got out of the truck and walked over to the drivers side to get a better look at it.  
      as i was observing it, a couple of cars pulled over to the side of the street and some people got out and started pointing at it.  so i knew that i wasn���t hallucinating because others were seeing it too.  we went ahead and made our delivery, which took about 15 to 20 minutes.  but, the whole time we worked, i was disappointed because i was going back and forth inside of the store because i was afraid that it would fly off before i could get a better look at it.  but the weirdest part was how every one else was reacting to it.
     as my dad was stocking the cooler, i noticed that everyone in the store was going on about their business like nothing was going on.  all someone had to do was, look out of the store window and they could clearly see the thing across the street.  but, no one seem to notice.  there were at least fifteen people milling around in the store, gathering up chips and soda pops.  then they would walk up to the cash register and pay for their items, then walk out the door and drive off. 
       i was puzzled by everyone���s reaction, so i decided to ask the man behind the cash register if he could see it.  i pointed out the front door and i asked, ���can you see that thing across the street?���  then he leaned over the counter to get a better look at it, and he said, ���yep!  what is that thing.���  i replied, ���my dad says that it���s a ufo.���  then he replied, ���ufo huh?  strangest thing i ever saw.���  then he just rung up the next customer and went about his business like he didn���t even care.
      now, needless to say, his reaction totally blew me away.  i was seeing something phenomenal and i felt like a kid in a candy store.  unlike everyone else, i was excited and i wished that i had a camera so that i could take pictures of it.  if i had a choice i would have even walked over to it to get a better look.  but everyone else was going about their business like it wasn���t even there. even my own dad was acting strange.  because, once we made our delivery, he just got in the tuck and drove off to the next stop.
      i remember being so disappointed because the direction we were heading would take us away from it.  as we drove east down the main drag ( hwy 285 ) i noticed the traffic coming toward us.  i thought that the occupants of the other cars coming toward us would see it as they approached it.  i looked through the rear view mirror on the side of the cab to see if any cars were pulling over to the side of the road.  then to my surprise, i noticed that none did.  so, i was really blown away then.  that is why i never forgot this unusual event. because of the way people in fort stockton were reacting to something so extraordinary.  but it didn���t end there.
     even though i was astonished at the way people were reacting and i was disappointed because i had lost site of the boomerang, my disappointment didn���t last very long.  as we were traveling east toward our next stop, i glanced out my window and i saw another one to the south of us.  from my position i reasoned that it was hovering over the junior high school.  then once again my excitement soared because i felt like i was experiencing a national geographic moment. but my dad just went on about his business, and the citizens of fort stockton went on about their business too.  
     my own brother was even acting strange.  every time i tried to get him to look at it, he would just say,   ���daddy told us not to look at it.  so, i���m not looking at it.  if you want to get in trouble, that���s up to you.  but i���m not looking at it.  i don���t want to get in trouble.���  he knew that it was there, but he refused to acknowledge it.  yet it still didn���t end there.
     as we traveled east to make our deliveries from stop to stop, i would search for gaps between businesses and buildings just to get a glimpse of it.  but, as we got further away, i finally lost sight of them.  yet once again, my disappoint didn���t last very long.  because i saw another one further south as we passed main street.  the only thing in that area was the main hospital and a trailer park off south 285.  
      now, here is the wildest part of the whole story.  it usually took my dad a whole day to make his deliveries.  he started early in the morning just as the stores started to open then he we would finish around six o���clock in the evening. which meant, that these boomerangs were hovering over ft. stockton for at least half a day.  yet there is more.
      my dad���s last stop was a gas plant about 30 to 40 miles outside of ft. stockton.  i can���t remember the name of the gas plant, but it was on the highway that heads east towards bakersfield.  anyway, as we traveled east i pondered everyone���s reaction to the boomerangs and i couldn���t understand why everyone was acting so weird.  
       then as we drove down the highway, i glanced outside of my passenger side window and once more, i saw another one.  it could have been the same one that i saw over the south of town or another one altogether.  in any event, this one was pacing us.  but this one was farther away.  it flew less than a hundred feet off the ground and i judged it to be at least a mile away.  i looked over at my dad and i wanted to point it out to him, but i changed my mind and kept it to myself.  so, i nudged my brother in the ribs and pointed it out to him. but once he saw it, he shook his head no, as a warning to me, then he continued to look straight ahead.  i watched it for awhile until we started to out pace it.  then i eventually lost sight of it.  yet it still didn���t end there.
       as we entered the gas plant, there was another one hanging over the plant.  this time, we were so close to it that there was no denying it or it���s size.  it was huge.  it was at the very least, the size of a football field and the thickness of a two-story building.  once again it hung over the plant no more than 30 feet high.  it was so low that it looked like someone standing on a catwalk could reach up and touch it.
     but this gas plant was more than just a gas plant.  the people that worked there, lived there in their own community.  that is why my dad made deliveries that far out.  once again, my dad warned us not to stare at the ufo because, we had work to do.  so, we went about our business loading and unloading until we were finished.  
    once we were done, we climbed back into the cab of the truck and i watched my dad prepare his bill.  then once he was finished, he said, ���i���m gonna go back inside and have a cup of coffee and settle up.  i want you boys to sit here till i get back.  and i don���t want you watchin that damn ufo either.���  so, he stepped down from the cab and walked into the office.
      the truck was parked facing away from the boomerang, so the only way i could see it was by looking out of the rear view mirrors attached to the side of the cab.  i was fascinated by it and i wanted to get out and take a closer look at it, but i was afraid that my dad would return at any moment. so i stayed in the cab as he had ordered and observed it from the rear view mirrors.  my brother on the other hand, just reached under the seat and pulled out a magazine to read.  
     i was shocked by the way he was acting and i needed to reassure my self that i wasn���t just seeing things.  so, i asked him, ���don���t you see that thing out there that daddy called a ufo.���  then he glanced out of the window and said, ���yeah, why?���  then i said, ���well, it���s a ufo, but everyone���s acting like it���s not even there.  don���t you even care about it.���  then he replied, ���yeah, i care about it.  but daddy told us not to be watchin it.  so, i ain���t watchin it.  if you want to watch it that���s your problem.  but i don���t want to get in trouble.���  then he just continued to read his magazine.
      needless to say, there were a thousand thoughts running through my head.  all i could think about was how everyone was acting.  i knew that i wasn���t hallucinating, because my brother had seen it and my dad had seen it.  then there was the cashier at the convenience store and the people in the cars that pulled over to the side of road to get out and point at it.  then i thought ���oh god!  they���re taking them all.���  even though i had never even heard of anything remotely related to abductions in my life, i believed that they, who ever they were, were taking every one, including my dad. 
       then i remember thinking, ���if they are taking everyone else, then why aren���t they taking us?���  so, i thought a lot about what had transpired over the last few hours.  but eventually i too got bored because my dad was taking so long to come back to the truck.  so, i grabbed a magazine and started reading one myself.
       then my dad finally walked out of the office and climbed into the cab, and first thing that i noticed was the look on his face.  as he sat down and started the engine, he looked absolutely terrified.  then as we backed out to leave, i noticed that the boomerang was gone.  now, this is the scary part.
       my dad had been gone for at least two hours before he returned to the truck.  as we drove back toward ft. stockton  i could still see the fear on his face and he never said a word. so, out of concern for him, i asked, ���daddy, are you ok.���  then he replied, ���i���m fine.  i don���t want to talk about it.���  he said ���i don���t want to talk about it,��� as though he thought that i knew exactly what he had gone through.  
       now, my dad was no wimp.  he stood six foot four and he was as strong as an ox.  one day, he knocked my brother completely off the top of one side of the truck, just by tossing a case of cans up to him.  he rode horses full out just like the cowboys did in the westerns.  he would lean forward in the saddle, while holding the bridle in his teeth, then whip the horse on the rump and gouge it with his spurs just make it run faster.  
       in my whole life i had never seen my dad afraid of anyone or anything.  if anyone was afraid, it was me and my brothers.  when he said jump, we jumped or we got a beating with a belt or a board.  but that day, he was terrified and his fear bothered me.  i felt as though he had been taken against his will, and i couldn���t imagine what had happened to him.   
       i have been carrying this phenomena with me for over thirty years and i never forgot it.  the only reason i am coming forward now is because of the debunkers and skeptics that spout off their opinions every time someone sees something extraordinary that they can���t explain.  people have been seeing ufo���s for years and they are still seeing them today.  but just because a skeptic hasn���t seen one or had an experience themselves, they come up with explanations that are even wilder than the sightings themselves. 
     what i saw cannot be so easily explained away, it wasn���t a blimp or a weather balloon, a cloud inversion or swamp gas.  our military didn���t have the technology to create crafts that defy gravity without making a sound and their wasn���t a mass hysteria by the population.  in fact, it was never even mentioned in the media.  i had intended to ask my class mates the following monday after i went back to school, but i completely forgot about it.  yet i searched the news paper every day for weeks for any kind of story remotely related to what i saw.
      so, today i am looking for anyone that lived there at that time or had parents that might have been witnesses themselves.  the implications of what i saw could be frightening or exciting, depending on how you look at it.  if what i witnessed was real, that means that every one of those kids in the those schools are adults today, and each one of them may have stories of their own.  instead of debunking and denying this sighting, the government should jump on this story so fast that it would make your head spin.  i went public with this story at the first of may, 2007. then someone else came forward because they remembered the same thing happening to them while they lived in mineral wells texas of the same year.
       i can be emailed at sticks109@iwon.Com or sticks109@gmail.Com   your story will remain confidential unless you allow me to use it.  i will not give out your name or any private information you share with me.  i am only looking for validation to what i saw and hoping that more people will come forward without fear of ridicule.   thank you for your cooperation
                                                                                                                carl
content.summary: More than four bommerang shaped objects the size of football fields were seen over ft stocktton texas by numerous witnesses
